name: Nova
descriptions: Nova is one of the residents of Megaton, serving as the self-described whore at Moriarty's Saloon in 2277.

Nova spends most of her time hanging around the bar talking to Gob, Moriarty, Jericho, and other customers. Every now and then, she goes up to her room with a client. Her standards are not exactly high, but she explicitly states that she does not serve ghouls.
She has lived in Megaton since around 2272, but has grown unenthusiastic during her stay.
Nova works at Moriarty's Saloon as a sex worker and can be found hanging out on the saloon's first floor talking to the locals and the Lone Wanderer.

topics.topic_text: How much for a room?
topics.response_text: Since Colin's not running the show anymore, it's just the room now. 120 caps. Up front.

topics.topic_text: No, thanks.
topics.response_text: Okay, then.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I don't have 120 caps.
topics.response_text: Well, you aren't gonna get very far with no money.{Flirty.}

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Well, hello there, Miss Dangerous. What can I do for you?

topics.topic_text: What's all this about Galaxy News Radio?
topics.response_text: You serious?

topics.topic_text: I talked to Moriarty already, and he's trying to charge me for the info.
topics.response_text: Ha ha. Yeah, that's Colin's style all right. He sells information so much, you'd think the bar was just a hobby.

topics.topic_text: Enough with the tough chick routine. Tell me more!
topics.response_text: Ohhh. You like it rough, huh? Well, that costs extra.

topics.topic_text: Look, if you can give me more information or point me in the right direction...
topics.response_text: Yeah, I help you, then Moriarty kicks my sweet ass out the door.

topics.topic_text: Look, sweetie. I'd love to spend time with you, but I need to find my Dad.
topics.response_text: Mmmm. I'd love to spend time with you too.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Moriarty's terminal?
topics.response_text: That stupid thing is his pride and joy. He keeps all of his dirty little secrets in it about everything that goes on in this godforsaken town.

topics.topic_text: I really need to get into that terminal.
topics.response_text: Yeah, and? So does ninety percent of Megaton. Take a number.

topics.topic_text: Help me get into that terminal, Nova. Finding my Dad means everything to me.
topics.response_text: Well, all right. You seem like a good kid. It isn't your fault Moriarty is such an asshole.

topics.topic_text: I'm sick of this shit. Help me get into the terminal so I can find what I need!
topics.response_text: Nice attitude, jackass.

topics.topic_text: All right, thanks.
topics.response_text: You're welcome.

topics.topic_text: Hey, sweetie. What can you tell me about Moriarty's terminal? I need in...
topics.response_text: Mmmmm. I bet you want in. But enough about us.

topics.topic_text: What's the story with that Ghoul?
topics.response_text: Who, Gob? Well, if you can get past how he looks, he's a sweetheart. Colin's awfully hard on him, though.

topics.topic_text: Where did he come from?
topics.response_text: He don't talk about it much but apparently, there's a whole city of Ghouls somewhere down in DC.

topics.topic_text: Do you ever... you know... work with him?
topics.response_text: With Gob? Well, he's sweet... and I know that he'd like to, it's just... well...

topics.topic_text: Why is Moriarty so hard on him?
topics.response_text: Well, the miserable bastard is hard on all of us. But Gob gets it the worst. I guess just because he's different, you know?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Sure thing, baby. What did you have on your mind?

topics.topic_text: So, what's it take to hire you?
topics.response_text: It used to be that Colin decided that stuff. But, with him gone, I'm thinking about retiring. So, no new clients. Sorry.

topics.topic_text: What were you saying about radio stations?
topics.response_text: Huh? Oh, you mean why was Gob banging on that radio? Well, out there in the Wastes, there are two stations that broadcast.

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.
topics.response_text: Right.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for my father. Middle-aged guy. Maybe you've seen him?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I remember that man. I saw him talking to Moriarty. It's hard to forget handsome men like that.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: Sorry, kid. It's not worth the shitstorm I'll bring on myself.

conversation.response_text: Lookin's free, the rest will cost ya.
Just give it up, Gob. You're not going to get anything.
I told you Gob, it ain't the radio. The Enclave station comes in fine. It's Galaxy News. Their signal's been shit lately.
I'm tired. I think I'm going to knock off early. I know you won't mind.
I... I'm sorry, Colin. I've been tired lately, you know? I ain't been myself. Don't worry, I'll pull it together. I promise.
You're all heart, you know that, Colin?{ }
Sorry, hon. I'm a lifer here. Just go drink your drink.

combat.response_text: Colin! We need help over here!
